root.title: dai-ichi hotel swiss franc note coupon cut
root.body: coupon dai-ichi hotel ltd 50 mln swiss franc issu five-year note equiti warrant cut 1-5/8 pct indic 1-7/8 pct lead manag swiss volksbank say warrant exercis price 1,507 yen per share compar last trade price 1,470 yen say note guarante long-term credit bank japan ltd payment due march 25
